projects.Title: Sprint Poker
projects.Description: Sprint Poker is an online web app for agile teams to collaboratively estimate tasks and plan sprints. It provides a simple, interactive interface to help teams reach a consensus on story points and align on sprint goals.

projects.Title: Fountain Show Booking System
projects.Description: A comprehensive platform for accessing garden information and booking tickets online, ensuring a seamless and convenient process for planning a visit.

projects.Title: Court Management System (User + Admin)
projects.Description: A full-stack Court Management System featuring distinct user and admin dashboards for streamlined court booking. It provides a robust interface for users to reserve courts while enabling administrators to efficiently manage all reservations, payments and system data.

projects.Title: Digi Album (Photographers & Users System)
projects.Description: A secure and cheapest S3 cloud platform for wedding photographers to manage clients and deliver high-resolution media albums. It enables couples to uniquely store, access, and share their precious wedding memories from anywhere

experience.title: Frontend Developer
